About.paragraph: We are a small team of techno functional young minds, Who are instrumental in blending and interfacing   ICT technology  with various areas of Health, Project Monitoring, News and Content Management and Education, social media and of course leveraging power of  search engines.

Software_Development.paragraph: We have a team of VBA developers who have a development experience with MNC brand like L & T and Nokia Siemens. We love challenges so what you want from your excel complex calculations, real time reporting from database or automation you can contact us. We will definitely solve all your concern by our technical knowledge & experience.

Web_Development.paragraph: A per todays trend people are migrating to open source & it is cost effective solution for small business. We provide guaranteed solution for Magneto or Word Press Website Design and Development. We also provide data entry operator for ecommerce websites so your worries about data entry of products, how it looks after entry done ETC is now ours. We also provide product base photography. Now a days Word Press Platform had covered 25% Market Share of Total Websites. We build a User Interface Design (UID) to enhance online sales, brand loyalty and consumer engagement. Ecommerce Technology – We design customized and affordable shopping cart solutions.

App_Development.paragraph: Today’s market is gadget market like mobile. More than 45% Google Surfing coming through mobile shows that future is mobile.
